headline: Eversource Energy (ES) Dealt a Blow by Connecticut Regulators
summary: Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) is included among the 14 Best Utility Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) operates New England’s largest energy delivery system and serves customers in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire. Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) slumped heavily this week after Connecticut regulators stopped the company from selling its water utility Aquarion for $2.4 […]
